title: Add focused frontend regression checklist for hotel profile/rooms/browsing/admin visibility

requirements.summary: Add a focused regression check section to the existing frontend regression checklist covering hotel profile save, room create/update with photos, guest hotel browsing visibility, and admin hotel visibility toggles.
acceptanceCriteria: Hotel portal: profile Save succeeds and persists after refresh.
Hotel portal: create room + upload/add pictures succeeds; room persists after refresh.
Guest portal: Browse Hotels lists active hotels; can open a hotel detail page.
Admin portal: Hotel Visibility Control lists hotels and can toggle active/subscription status without errors.

file_operations.description: Add/refresh a dedicated, high-signal regression subsection (manual checks) that explicitly validates: (1) HotelProfilePanel Save Changes persists and survives refresh, (2) RoomsPanel create/update with multiple photos (data URLs) persists and survives refresh, (3) BrowseHotelsPage shows active hotels and can navigate into HotelDetailPage, and (4) Admin HotelVisibilityPanel can toggle active/subscription and changes persist after refetch/refresh.
